article:
Learning how to play the piano is not the only way for children to have a bright future. Storytelling can also take them on the road to _ excellent students. The _ in Shanghai have paid much attention to storytelling. They _ many storytelling contests  every year. And the children have _ great interest and taken an active part in this. Some students who were too shy to speak in public have been now very good _ .
One leader from Shanghai said: " Now many parents _ their children to learn how to play the piano or violin. _ the money and energy they spend can't ensure  that their children will _ much in a short period of time. However, training children to tell stories is quite _ .Although it costs little, it's a good and easy way for children to develop(, ) .
